DOC.criteria: Age 40 +/10 year Seronegativity HIV 2 Patients group A : seropositivity HIV 1 confirm ELISA Western Blot least 2 year never receive antiretroviral treatment , viral plasmatique load > 1000 copy / ml Patients group B : seropositivity HIV 1 confirm ELISA Western Blot least 2 year stable antiretroviral treatment least 6 month , viral load undetectable plasmatique ( < 40 copy / ml ) patient group C : Matching age ( +/3 year ) patient Be consider healthy Investigator clinical examination Seronegativity HIV 1 confirm ELISA day take group A et B Age < 30 year > 50 year Seropositivity HIV 2 group C Seropositivity HIV 2 Be medicinal treatment
